SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ArrayList<T>
ArrayList is a resizable array-based implementation of a list.
ArrayOrderedList<T>
ArrayOrderedList implements an ordered list using an array.
ArrayStack<T>
This class represents a ArrayStack that follows the Last-In-First-Out (LIFO) principle, where elements are added and removed from the top of the stack.
ArrayUnorderedList<T>
This class represents a ArrayUnorderedList where elements are added in an unordered way.
AutoSimulation
Class responsible for simulating an automatic mission execution.
Backpack
Represents a backpack that holds items for a player.
ConcurrentModificationException
ConcurrentModificationException is an exception that is thrown when a collection is modified while an iterator is in use.
ElementNotFoundException
ElementNotFoundException is an exception that is thrown when an element is not found in a collection.
EmptyBackPackException
The EmptyBackPackException is thrown when an attempt is made to interact with an empty backpack, such as trying to use an item when there are no items available.
EmptyCollectionException
EmptyCollectionException is thrown when a collection is empty
Enemy
The Enemy class represents an enemy character in the game.
Entity
Represents a generic entity in the game.
ExportData
ExportData provides methods for exporting game-related data to JSON files.
FullBackPackException
The FullBackPackException is thrown when an attempt is made to add an item to a backpack that has reached its maximum capacity.
GameSettings
This class represents the settings for the game, such as backpack capacity, max enemy moves, character health, and player power.
Graph<T>
A class that represents an undirected graph using an adjacency matrix.
GraphADT<T>
* GraphADT defines the interface to a graph data structure
HealthKit
Represents a health kit item that can recover a player's health points.
IBackpack
Represents the interface for a backpack in the game.
IEnemy
The IEnemy interface defines the basic contract for any enemy in the game.
IEntity
The ICharacter interface defines the basic contract for any character in the game.
IHealthKit
The IHealthKit interface defines the basic contract for any health kit in the game.
IItem
The IItem interface defines the basic contract for any item in the game.
IllegalArgumentException
IllegalArgumentException is thrown when an argument is not valid.
IMap
The IMap interface defines the basic contract for the map in the game.
IMFSimulator
This class contains the main method that initializes the game by calling the welcomeMenu() method to display the welcome menu and start the game.
IMission
Represents the interface for a mission in the game.
ImportData
The ImportData class handles the importing of game and mission data from JSON files.
IPlayer
The IPlayer interface defines the basic contract for any player in the game.
IRoom
Represents the interface for a room in the game.
IShield
The IShield interface defines the basic contract for any shield in the game.
ITarget
The ITarget interface defines the basic contract for any target in the game.
Item
Represents a generic item in the game.
LinearNode<T>
LinearNode represents a node in a linked collection.
LinkedQueue<T>
A linked implementation of a Queue (FIFO - First In, First Out).
LinkedStack<T>
This class represents a LinkedStack that follows the Last-In-First-Out (LIFO) principle, where elements are added and removed from the top of the stack.
ListADT<T>
The ListADT interface defines the general methods for a list.
ManualSimulation
Class responsible for simulating a manual mission execution.
Map
Represents a map of the game, consisting of interconnected rooms.
Menus
The Menus class handles the user interface for the game, providing menus for navigation, settings management, and simulation operations.
Mission
Represents a mission in the game.
MissionDisplay
The MissionDisplay class is responsible for displaying the image associated with a specific mission in the game.
Network<T>
Represents a weighted undirected network.
NetworkADT<T>
NetworkADT defines the interface to a network.
NoMissionInstantiated
The NoMissionInstantiated exception is thrown when an attempt is made to access the Mission instance before it has been properly initialized.
NonComparableElementException
NonComparableElementException is thrown when an element is not comparable
NoSuchElementException
NoSuchElementException is thrown when an element is not found
OrderedListADT<T>
OrderedListADT defines the interface to an ordered list collection.
Player
The Player class represents a player in the game.
PlayerLeftException
The PlayerLeftException is thrown when an action is attempted after the player has left or exited from the game.
QueueADT<T>
Interface that defines the standard operations for a queue data structure.
Room
Represents a room in the game.
Shield
Represents a shield item in the game.
Simulation
Provides utility methods for simulating gameplay mechanics such as moving players and enemies between rooms, and filtering enemies based on their locations relative to the player.
SimulationResults
Represents the results of a simulation, including details about the mission, the remaining health of the player, the success status, and the route taken during the simulation.
StackADT<T>
Interface that defines the standard operations for a stack data structure.
Target
Represents a target in the game, which the player must interact with.
UnorderedListADT<T>
OrderedListADT defines the interface to an unordered list collection.
